name: insupportably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is difficult or impossible to bear: The weather that day was insupportably hot and humid. The cost of doing business in this part of the world is insupportably high.
More examplesFewer examplesLong-distance travel is becoming insupportably expensive.I found it insupportably painful to watch her leave.He is an insupportably vain and arrogant man.Even the rich are discovering that the cost of living is becoming insupportably high.The film is an almost insupportably distressing study of a young woman's struggle.
